entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is present in the scene and is talking to Harry and Hermione. He is described as sounding desperate and close to tears.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is present in the scene and is talking to Hagrid and Harry. She sounds as though she wants to cry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is present in the scene and is looking at the mound with Hagrid and Hermione.

entities.name: the creature
entities.description: The creature is a sleeping being that is described as having a curved back and deep, grunting breathing. It is not clear what kind of creature it is.
